result.title: Unexpected Runtime Error
result.content:
I am getting runtime error in this problem http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/313/B

and not able to figure out why .. please help !!

****
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int getmid(int a, int b)
{
	return a + (b-a)/2;
}

int constructST(int ss,int se, char* array,int *st,int index)
{
	if(ss == se)
	{
		if(array[ss] == array[ss+1])
			st[index] = 1;
		else
			st[index] = 0;
		return st[index];
	}
	int mid = getmid(ss,se);
	st[index] = constructST(ss,mid,array,st,index*2+1)+
							constructST(mid+1,se,array,st,index*2+2);
	return st[index];
}
int getval(int ss,int se, int* st,int qs,int qe,int index)
{
	if(ss >= qs && se <= qe)
		return st[index];
	if(se < qs || ss > qe)
		return 0;
	int mid = getmid(ss,se);
	return getval(ss,mid,st,qs,qe,2*index+1) +
				getval(mid+1,se,st,qs,qe,2*index+2);
}
int main()
{
	int len,a,b;
	char str[100002];
	scanf("%s",str);
	int *st,n,x;
	len = strlen(str);
	x = ceil(log2(len))-1;
	x = pow(2,x+1) -1;
	st = (int*) malloc(x*sizeof(int));
	x = constructST(0,len-1,str,st,0);
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		printf("%d\n",getval(0,len-1,st,a-1,b-2,0));
	}
	return 0;
}
